languages.text: В журнале [{bind|OpenJournal}] появились свежие контракты. Контракты — это задания ваших колоний, за выполнение которых можно получить в награду ресурсы или уникальные предметы или повысить фактор прибыли. Иногда выполнение контрактов одной колонии может повлиять на эффективность других ваших колоний.

New contracts are now available in the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}]! Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.
languages.original_text: В журнале [{bind|OpenJournal}] появились свежие контракты. Контракты — это задания ваших колоний, за выполнение которых можно получить в награду ресурсы или уникальные предметы или повысить фактор прибыли. Иногда выполнение контрактов одной колонии может повлиять на эффективность других ваших колоний.

traits.locale_text: New contracts are now available in the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}]! Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your profit factor, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.

New contracts are now available in the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}]! Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your profit factor, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.

New contracts are now available in the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}]! Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.

By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.

New contracts are now available in the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}]! Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.

New contracts are now available in the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}]! Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.

languages.text: 您可以在日志 [{bind|OpenJournal}] 中查看新的合约了！ 合约代表您的殖民地发出的请求。完成合约之后，您可以获得资源，提高{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}利润因子{/g}，或获得独一无二的物品。有些时候，完成某个殖民地的合约后，还会提高其他殖民地的生产能力。
languages.original_text: New contracts are now available in the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}]! Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.

traits.locale_text: 您可以在日志 [{bind|OpenJournal}] 中查看新的合约了！ 合约代表您的殖民地发出的请求。完成合约之后，您可以获得资源，提高{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}利润因子{/g}，或获得独一无二的物品。有些时候，完成某个殖民地的合约后，还会提高其他殖民地的生产能力。

languages.text: 日誌に新しい契約が追加された[{bind|OpenJournal}]！ 契約はコロニーからの要請である。達成すると資源を手に入れたり、{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}利益因子{/g}を上げたり、特別なアイテムを受け取ることができる。あるコロニーから提示された契約を履行することで、他のコロニーの生産性に影響を及ぼすこともある。
languages.original_text: New contracts are now available in the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}]! Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.

traits.locale_text: 日誌に新しい契約が追加された[{bind|OpenJournal}]！ 契約はコロニーからの要請である。達成すると資源を手に入れたり、{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}利益因子{/g}を上げたり、特別なアイテムを受け取ることができる。あるコロニーから提示された契約を履行することで、他のコロニーの生産性に影響を及ぼすこともある。

languages.text: ¡Hay nuevos contratos disponibles en el diario [{bind|OpenJournal}]! Los contratos son solicitudes enviadas por tus colonias. Al completarlos, puedes obtener recursos, aumentar tu {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}factor de beneficio{/g} o recibir objetos únicos. A veces completar los contratos de una colonia puede afectar a la productividad de las otras.
languages.original_text: New contracts are now available in the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}]! Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.

traits.locale_text: ¡Hay nuevos contratos disponibles en el diario [{bind|OpenJournal}]! Los contratos son solicitudes enviadas por tus colonias. Al completarlos, puedes obtener recursos, aumentar tu {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}factor de beneficio{/g} o recibir objetos únicos. A veces completar los contratos de una colonia puede afectar a la productividad de las otras.

languages.text: Neue Verträge sind jetzt im Tagebuch [{bind|OpenJournal}] verfügbar! Verträge sind Anfragen, die von deinen Kolonien gestellt werden. Wenn du sie erfüllst, kannst du Ressourcen erhalten, deinen {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}Profitfaktor{/g} erhöhen oder einzigartige Gegenstände erhalten. Manchmal kann die Erfüllung von Verträgen, die von einer Kolonie angeboten werden, die Produktivität anderer Kolonie beeinflussen.
languages.original_text: New contracts are now available in the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}]! Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.

traits.locale_text: Neue Verträge sind jetzt im Tagebuch [{bind|OpenJournal}] verfügbar! Verträge sind Anfragen, die von deinen Kolonien gestellt werden. Wenn du sie erfüllst, kannst du Ressourcen erhalten, deinen {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}Profitfaktor{/g} erhöhen oder einzigartige Gegenstände erhalten. Manchmal kann die Erfüllung von Verträgen, die von einer Kolonie angeboten werden, die Produktivität anderer Kolonie beeinflussen.

languages.text: De nouveaux contrats sont disponibles dès à présent dans le journal [{bind|OpenJournal}] ! Les contrats correspondent aux demandes émises par vos colonies. En les exécutant, vous pouvez obtenir des ressources, augmenter votre {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}facteur d'influence{/g} ou recevoir des objets uniques. L'exécution de contrats proposés par une colonie peut parfois affecter la productivité d'autres colonies.
languages.original_text: New contracts are now available in the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}]! Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.

traits.locale_text: De nouveaux contrats sont disponibles dès à présent dans le journal [{bind|OpenJournal}] ! Les contrats correspondent aux demandes émises par vos colonies. En les exécutant, vous pouvez obtenir des ressources, augmenter votre {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}facteur d'influence{/g} ou recevoir des objets uniques. L'exécution de contrats proposés par une colonie peut parfois affecter la productivité d'autres colonies.

De nouveaux contrats sont disponibles dès à présent dans le journal [{bind|OpenJournal}] ! Les contrats correspondent aux demandes émises par vos colonies. En les exécutant, vous pouvez obtenir des ressources, augmenter votre {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}facteur de profit{/g} ou recevoir des objets uniques. L'exécution de contrats proposés par une colonie peut parfois affecter la productivité d'autres colonies.

languages.text: Seyir defterinde [{bind|OpenJournal}] yeni kontratlar mevcut! Kontratlar kolonilerinin yaptığı taleplerdir. Onları tamamlayarak kaynak elde edebilir, {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}kâr faktörünü{/g} artırabilir veya eşsiz eşyalar kazanabilirsin. Kimi zaman bir koloninin çıkardığı kontratı tamamlamak diğer kolonilerinin üretkenliğini etkileyebilir.
languages.original_text: New contracts are now available in the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}]! Contracts are requests issued by your colonies. By fulfilling them, you can obtain resources, increase your {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}profit factor{/g}, or receive unique items. Sometimes fulfilling contracts offered by one colony can affect the productivity of your other colonies.
